record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL TUESDAY, JANUARY 16, 2007, AT 10 A.M.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I now ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 3:46 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, January 16, 2007, at 10 a.m.
